Posts.Content: Imisfit wrote: Hello I’m 24. When I was about 22 I found a small lump a few days before my period. went to my doctor on campus and she wasnt worried about it due to the size and the fact it could be moved. It started to grow overtime only hurting around my period or if I had heavy amounts of caffeine. I took my nipple ring out and while the lump grew my nipple began being pulled inward. I went to see a doctor and they ordered a mammogram and ultrasound. A 4.73x2.77x5.45 cm mass was found. Swollen lymph’s as well. This has I’ll defined margins with punctuate microcalcificarions within. Highly suspicious for malignancy. Bi-rad 5 I was thinking it could be a fibroaderma. Because I got these results in less than 5 minutes. I go in for a biopsy this Friday. But I’m very nervous. I really am hoping for the best but it’s not looking too good. I haven’t had the chance to live. Has anyone had this sort of issue and it has turned out not to be cancer. Or if it was cancer is this something that sounds familiar. Anything to help me worry less please. Thank you. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Suspicious mass found Imisfit marie5890

Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2018 02:26AM Imisfit wrote: thank you all! I’m such a nervous wreck. I have been on google. I can’t help it. I’m just so scared and this is my first time dealing with something like this and my parents aren’t in the states so that’s even harder for me. If anyone wants to take a look at my results and maybe give feedback a PM would be nice thank you ladies
